title: Internet & Technology: Access (Usefulness 4)
description: Traveler usefulness 4/10 phrases for the Access subcategory within Internet & Technology. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: I'll connect the internet with a new PC.
cards.romaji: Atarashi pasokon de netto ni setsuzoku suru.
cards.japanese: 新しいパソコンでネットに接続する。
